channel.title: Barrows text over head
channel.description: Okay, so I have been working on making close to exactly like Runescape barrows, but getting rid of the more difficult parts. How can I make it so, when you click the tomb, and the NPC spawns, it says over it's head, "You dare disturb my Eternal rest!" Or something like that?

item.title: Barrows text over head
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:2, topic:290979"]In the method you use to spawn the npc when the player opens the sarcophagus, check the npc’s id, if it’s between 2025-2030, then activate the npc chat update mask.[/quote]What’s npc chat update mask haha. I’ve never heard of it

Oh and in the place where you spawn the npc’s it’s like

if (objectID ==6703){ if(dharokSummoned != 2 && dharokSummoned != 0) { if(server.npcHandler.npcs[barrowBroSlot] != null) { server.npcHandler.npcs[barrowBroSlot].absX = 0; server.npcHandler.npcs[barrowBroSlot].absY = 0; server.npcHandler.npcs[barrowBroSlot].followPlayer = 0; } dharokSummoned = 0; } heightLevel = 0; toX = 3574; toY = 3297; }

Read full topic

item.title: Barrows text over head
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

In the method you use to spawn the npc when the player opens the sarcophagus, check the npc’s id, if it’s between 2025-2030, then activate the npc chat update mask.

Read full topic
